#summary How to support this project
#labels Featured

The developers of *Zaitun Time Series* use their spare time to develop *Zaitun Time Series*. And unfortunately, this project has costs that need to be covered for hardware, hosting services, domain registration, web software, and other expenses that come up for the development, maintenance, and promotion of *Zaitun Time Series*.

Please make donation if you find *Zaitun Time Series* is useful and if you are interested in keeping Zaitun Time Series in a position to continue its development into the future. Your donation can be sent via PayPal donation.
